snippet: Israeli leaders, from the prime minister on down, expressed shock and condemnation over a confrontation caught on video and shown repeatedly on a popular news program.
abstract: Israeli military announces suspension of Lt Col Shalom Eisner, who was caught on videotape striking a Danish pro-Palestinian activist in the face with a rifle; assault occurs during standoff between soldiers and participants in a bike tour organized to draw attention to living conditions of Palestinian villagers in the West Bank.
lead_paragraph: Israeli leaders, from the prime minister on down, expressed shock and condemnation over a confrontation caught on video and shown repeatedly on a popular news program.

headline.seo: Israeli Military Officer Suspended for Striking Activist With Rifle
headline.main: Israeli Military Officer Suspended for Striking Activist With Rifle
headline.print_headline: After Clash Caught on Video, Israeli Officer Is Suspended for Striking an Activist
